description: Rada Miskovic, after reviewing mounting evidence and recognizing the volatile public mood, meets with her closest ally at Bar 101. She confides her intent to expose all BCI and Council abuses at once, rejecting gradual reform.

Rada executes a raw, unfiltered broadcast of all secret BCI abuses and Council manipulations citywide. The wave of revelations sparks immediate outrage, rupturing neighborhood alliances and igniting fierce public debate over the contest and legitimacy of all factions.

Neighborhood assemblies scramble to respond, forming rapidly shifting alliances and accusing each other of sabotage and historic BCI abuses. AI inheritance contest protocols become a battleground for competing public narratives.

Public rifts deepen as AI contest riddles force neighborhoods to admit to years of manipulative behavior and score tampering. Protests and street clashes flare, with slogans demanding justice and transparency appearing throughout Stenograd.

Leading assemblies negotiate a temporary cooling-off period to prevent further violence. Order remains fragile, and rumors grow that the Council may attempt forceful intervention if instability resumes.
